name: Stop That Roach!
overview: As either Ken or Lilly, it's your job to battle those nasty roaches that have invaded your kitchen and eating all your snacks. Pick up the nearest household item, be it a broom or bedroom slipper and smash the bugs flat. But watch out, these roaches have a serious attitude and aren't afraid to fight back. Once you have corralled a group of roaches, lure them into a trap or eliminate them using bug spray! In all, the roaches have 100 different strategies for getting past you and at the food. - 100 challenging puzzles to solve - Battle roaches as either Ken or Lilly - Draw from an arsenal of items including a broom, newspaper and roach trap - Password option allows you to play puzzles you've already solved - Get helpful hints to plan your next move
